TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Payuwan, title = Payuwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Payuwan} }

S.FORM: Payuwan Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtung ko Payuwan a niyaro', 156 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 531 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 518 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 91%, Rukai 1%, Tayal 2%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

Payowan Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtong ko Payowan a niyaro', 156 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 531 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 518 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 91%, Rokai 1%, Tayal 2%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
